administrators_configuration.description: Follow these steps to intialize the Ledger Blue Enterprise. This device is needed to access and use the Vault platform.
administrators_configuration.step1: Get the Ledger Blue Enterprise and the Recovery Sheet from the sealed box.
administrators_configuration.step3: Store the Recovery Sheet in a safe place.
administrators_configuration.title: Initialization

administrators_prerequisite.description: In the following steps, we'll add Administrators to your workspace and initialize their Ledger Blue Enterprise.
administrators_prerequisite.title: Prerequisites

administrators_registration.at_least: At least 3 Administrators are required to continue
administrators_registration.description: Register the Administrators of your workspace. Administrators can perform sensitive actions such as creating accounts.
administrators_registration.description_strong: It's not possible to delete Administrators once they're created.

device_modal.step1: Switch on the Ledger Blue Enterprise and connect it to your computer using the provided USB cable.
device_modal.step2: Enter your PIN code to unlock your device, then open the Vault app from the ledger Blue Enterprise dashboard.
device_modal.step3: Tap <0>Confirm</0> when prompted, then tap the square icon in the top right corner to close the app. Next, disconnect the device from the computer.
device_modal.title: Registration

administrators_registration.title: Registration

administrators_scheme.description: This step allows you to define the number of approvals you must collect from all registered Administrators to authorize sensitive actions.
administrators_scheme.title: Admin rule

backup.description: Back up your 24-word recovery phrase in the Ledger Cryptosteel.
backup.title: Backup
backup.warning: Don't destroy the Recovery Sheet before the 24 words are secured on the Ledger Cryptosteel.

box_blue_devices: Box of Ledger Blue Enterprise devices

confirmation.description: Your Ledger Vault workspace is now configured.
confirmation.title: Complete

confirmation_cancel.desc: It looks like you've canceled the {{entity}}.
confirmation_cancel.mistake: You've made a mistake when registering {{entity}}.
confirmation_cancel.security: You believe the security of your Ledger Vault might be compromised

master_seed_configuration.description: Follow these steps to initialize the Ledger Blue Enterprise.
master_seed_configuration.step1: Get the Ledger Blue Enterprise and the Recovery Sheet from the sealed box.
master_seed_configuration.step3: Ensure your Ledger Cryptosteel is safely secured and your Recovery Sheet is destroyed.
master_seed_configuration.title: Initialization

master_seed_prerequisite.description: In this last step, we'll generate your company's master seed, which is the private cryptographic key created from the three Shared-Owners Ledger Blue Enterprise devices.
master_seed_prerequisite.title: Prerequisites

master_seed_provisionning.description: Click <0>Get seed</0> and connect the Ledger Blue Enterprise of the first Shared-Owner, and repeat this step for the remaining two Shared-Owners.

device_modal.step1: Switch on the Ledger Blue Enterprise and connect it to your computer using the provided USB cable.
device_modal.step2: Enter your PIN code to unlock your device, then open the Vault app from the ledger Blue Enterprise dashboard.
device_modal.step3: Tap <0>Confirm</0> when prompted, then tap the square icon in the top right corner to close the app. Next, disconnect the device from the computer.
device_modal.title: Generate Master Seed

master_seed_provisionning.title: Create master seed

master_seed_signin.ask_admin: Sign in each Administrator one by one using their Ledger Blue Enterprise.
master_seed_signin.description: Sign in to confirm your registration.

device_modal.step1: Switch on the Ledger Blue Enterprise and connect it to your computer using the provided USB cable.
device_modal.step2: Enter your PIN code to unlock your device, then open the Vault app from the ledger Blue Enterprise dashboard.
device_modal.step3: Tap <0>Confirm</0> when prompted, then tap the square icon in the top right corner to close the app. Next, disconnect the device from the computer.
device_modal.title: Sign in with your device

master_seed_signin.title: Sign in
master_seed_signin.to_continue: Ask each administrator to sign in using their Ledger Blue devices.

so_registration.desc: Click <0>Add Shared-Owner</0> and connect the Ledger Blue Enterprise of the Shared-Owner, and repeat this step for the remaining two Shared-Owners.
so_registration.description_strong: It's not possible to delete Shared-Owners once they're created.
so_registration.title: Registration

so_validation.desc: Get the quorum of Administrators to sign in to finalize the registration of Shared-Owners.
so_validation.title: Approve registration

welcome.description: The Onboarding wizard will guide you through the configuration of your Ledger Vault workspace in three steps:
welcome.step3: Finally, we'll create the master seed.
welcome.title: Welcome

wrapping_key.description: Click <0>Get Wrapping Key</0> and connect the Ledger Blue Enterprise of the first Wrapping Key Custodian, and repeat this step for the remaining two Wrapping Key Custodians.

device_modal.step1: Switch on the Ledger Blue Enterprise and connect it to your computer using the provided USB cable.
device_modal.step2: Enter your PIN code to unlock your device, then open the Vault app from the Ledger Blue Enterprise dashboard.
device_modal.step3: Tap <0>Confirm</0> when prompted, then tap the square icon in the top right corner to close the app. Next, disconnect the device from the computer.
device_modal.title: Generate Vault Wrapping Key

wrapping_key.label: Wrapping Key Custodians
wrapping_key.signin_desc: Sign in each Wrapping Key Custodians one by one by using their Ledger Blue Enterprise
wrapping_key.title: Create Wrapping Key

wrapping_key_init.description: Follow these steps to initialize the Ledger Blue Enterprise. This device is needed to update the Ledger Vault platform.
wrapping_key_init.step1: Get the Ledger Blue Enterprise and the Recovery Sheet from the sealed box.
wrapping_key_init.step3: Ensure your Ledger Cryptosteel is safely secured and your Recovery Sheet is destroyed.
wrapping_key_init.title: Initialization

wrapping_key_prerequisite.description: In the following steps, Wrapping Key Custodians will initialize their Ledger Blue Enterprise to generate your organization's partition.
wrapping_key_prerequisite.title: Prerequisites
